topic:
FTP will be sunset on Wednesday, May 27th, 2020 in-favor of the CMS CLI, which supports all of the same functionality FTP supported and more.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/cms-cli-replacing-ftp>

purpose:
FTP will be sunset Wednesday May 27th, use CLI instead
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/cms-cli-replacing-ftp>
How to connect to HubSpot via FTP
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/HubSpot-ftp>
doesn’t support 2FA, SSO, themes, serverless
text:
set the channel description: FTP will be sunset Wednesday May 27th, use CLI instead
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/cms-cli-replacing-ftp>
How to connect to HubSpot via FTP
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/HubSpot-ftp>
doesn’t support 2FA, SSO, themes, serverless
If you haven’t yet I encourage hopping over to <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> to learn about the CLI, and the cool things it can do.
